name: Unknown Tape 0.9
description:
A short story of a murderer recorded on tape, which shows that in the forest you are not alone.

The first 8-10minutes project, I hope you will enjoy. This game is a quick idea for a larger project, let me know if you would like a whole game in this style.

If there are any bugs, write me in the comments, I will try to fix it as soon as possible.

I recommend playing with headphones.

Warning!

There is no save in the game and no way to exit once the game starts.

Use WASD to move, mouse to look around.
